idea-plugin.name: SQL Params Setter
idea-plugin.description:
A simple tool that helps you to extract a executable sql from mybatis logs like below: ==> Preparing: select * from table where name = ? ==> Parameters: Tom(String) After selecting these two lines of logs above, you can right click your mouse and select "SQL Params Setter" in the popup menu, then the result executable sql, i.e. "select * from table where name = 'Tom'" will be copied to your clipboard.
Note: The selected area should contain both keyword [Preparing:] in the 1st line and keyword [Parameters:] in the 2nd line.
idea-plugin.change-notes: 1. basic function of extracting one executable sql at a time from mybatis logs.
